title: Chicago boxer Adrian Granados fighting to honor memory of slain friend - Chicago Tribune

organizations.name: chicago tribune sports sports columnists chicago

text:
Sports Sports Columnists Chicago boxer Adrian Granados fighting to honor memory of slain friend 
Boxer Adrian Granados is dedicating his latest fight to his best friend, Ed Brown, who was shot and killed in Chicago in December. The bout against Adrien Broner will take place Feb. 18 and will air on Showtime. (Michael Tercha)
